title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 566 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 566 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts

State Regulations
§ 566.1 - Basis of credits to operating revenue accounts
§ 566.2 - Water supplied without direct charge
§ 566.3 - Water or steam used by the utility
§ 566.4 to 566.5 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 566

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §89-c, subd. 3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
